dict.acceptation: 有效率的；（直接）生效的；能干的；（因省钱、省时或省力等而）收效大的；

sent.orig: Resource-efficient society needs resource-efficient school and which is the groundwork of constructing resource-efficient society.
sent.trans: 节约型社会呼唤节约型学校，节约型学校是建设节约型社会的根基。

sent.orig: Is committed to the development of efficient, convenient and efficient processing equipment.
sent.trans: 主要是致力于发展各种高效率，加工便捷的设备。

sent.orig: Adopt the efficient separator of oil and water and filtrating and circulatory system and better efficient.
sent.trans: 采用高效油水分离器及过滤循环系统，效率更高。

sent.orig: To accomplish this solely within public means is neither cost efficient nor management efficient.
sent.trans: 只靠公营机构的力量去完成这项工作，无论在成本效率或是管理效率方面，均不可取。

sent.orig: Water-efficient agriculture and industry shall be developed to build a water-efficient city.
sent.trans: 发展节水型农业、节水型工业，建设节水型城市。
